snippet: Prosecutors are expected to review whether the police in Pine Bluff reacted appropriately in the killing of a 107-year-old man during a confrontation with a SWAT team.
abstract: Prosecutors are expected to review whether police in Pine Bluff, Ark, reacted appropriately in killing of 107-year-old man during confrontation with a SWAT team.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are expected to review whether the police in Pine Bluff reacted appropriately in the killing of a 107-year-old man during a confrontation with a SWAT team.

headline.main: Arkansas: Man, 107, Killed Resisting Swat Team
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Man, 107, Killed Resisting SWAT Team
